unitTitle: Unit 11: Making a Film - Passive Voice (Present)

grammarTerms.definition: A form where the subject receives the action
grammarTerms.example: Films are made in London. (passive voice)

grammarTerms.definition: A form where the subject does the action
The person or thing doing the action
grammarTerms.example: The film is made by the director. (director = agent)

grammarTerms.definition: A tool used to do something
grammarTerms.example: Bread is cut with a knife. (knife = instrument)
The picture is painted with oil paints. (oil paints = material)

difficultWords.definition: Things kept as reminders of places
difficultWords.example: Their houses are decorated with old film souvenirs.

difficultWords.definition: A place where films are made
difficultWords.example: They want to see the famous film studios.
Evening shows are put on by dancers and musicians.
The main streets are decorated with bright lights.
Hollywood is visited by thousands of tourists.

difficultWords.vietnamese: Hollywood (khu vực làm phim ở Mỹ)
difficultWords.example: Lots of films are made in Hollywood.

difficultWords.definition: Person in charge of making a film
difficultWords.example: The actors' names are written by the director.

difficultWords.definition: A woman who acts in films
difficultWords.example: Lots of actors and actresses live in Hollywood.

keyPhrases.usage: When we don't know/care who does the action

keyPhrases.definition: Shows who does the action in passive
keyPhrases.example: Hollywood is visited by thousands of tourists.
keyPhrases.usage: Use 'by' to show WHO does it

keyPhrases.definition: Shows what tool or material is used
keyPhrases.example: Bread is cut with a knife.
keyPhrases.usage: Use 'with' to show WHAT is used

usefulExpressions.example: Hollywood is filled with famous people.
Our clothes are made from modern material.
The main streets are decorated with bright lights.
Evening shows are put on by dancers and musicians.
They want to see the famous film studios.
The streets are decorated with bright lights.
Hollywood is filled with famous people.
